# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Provides the source float triplet at the subscripted index.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc subscript(index: Int32) -> (Float, Float, Float) { get }
```

## Discussion

This subscript operates on three-component geometry sources with a [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeometrySource/format] of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLVertexFormat/float3]. This operator returns an (x, y, z) offset relative to its parent anchor’s position that corresponds to the subscripted vertex position in [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARMeshGeometry/vertices] and to the subscripted normal vector in [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARMeshGeometry/normals].

## Accessing Geometry

- **subscript(_:)**: Provides the number at the subscripted index.
- **buffer**: A Metal buffer that contains a list of vectors.
